ASE_Assignment_Sameer_Basnet_77356702
Table of Contents

Namespace ASE_Assignment.Commands

Classes

AppRectangle

Represents a command to draw a rectangle on the canvas.

CommandCast

Represents a command to cast values between variables of different types.

CommandCircle

Represents a command to draw a circle on a canvas.

CommandClear

Represents a command that clears the Canvas. The command does not take any parameters.

CommandDrawTo

Represents a command to draw to a specified position on a canvas.

CommandElse

Represents the "Else" command in a program, providing branching logic for conditional execution.

CommandEnd

Represents the "End" command in a control flow structure.

CommandFill

Represents a command that sets the fill state for a shape on the Canvas. The command takes one parameter: a string that indicates whether the shape should be filled.

CommandFor

Represents an application-specific implementation of the BOOSE.For class, providing functionality to reset or decrease a private static field.

CommandIf

Represents the "If" command in a program, enabling conditional execution of commands.

CommandMethod

Represents an application-specific method class that overrides restrictions on method counts and provides functionality to reset or decrease private static fields.

CommandMoveTo

Represents a command to move to a specified position on a canvas.

CommandPeek

Represents a "Peek" command that retrieves a value from a specific cell in an array.

CommandPenColour

Represents a command to set the pen color on a canvas.

CommandPensize

Represents a command that sets the pen size for drawing on the Canvas. The command takes one parameter: the desired pen size.

CommandPoke

Represents a "Poke" command that sets a value in a specific cell of an array.

CommandReset

Represents a command that resets the Canvas to its initial state. The command does not take any parameters.

CommandTriangle

Represents a command that draws a triangle on the Canvas. This command accepts two integer parameters: base length and height.

CommandWhile
CommandWriteto

Represents a command that writes text to a Canvas. This command ensures the text is valid before writing.
